gw.document

Class DocumentDetailsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentDetailsInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.web.document.DocumentWebFileInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentDetailsInfo

    public class DocumentDetailsInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.web.document.DocumentWebFileInfo
    Encapsulates information about a Document entity whose details are being displayed on the document details UI page.

    This wrapper entity is required because the user may upload new document contents from the document details page, and those document contents need to be stored on the server side until the user commits all of his or her changes and the new content can be uploaded to the document management system.

    Author:
    Bryan Johnson

      • setFile

        public void setFile(WebFile file)

      • setFile

        public void setFile(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String mimeType,
           java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Set the WebFile holding the contents of any document that is in the input stream. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the document
        mimeType - MIME type of the document
        inputStream - inputstream that holds the content

      • isUploadFile

        public boolean isUploadFile()
        Indicates whether the user wants to upload new content for the document.
        Returns:
        True if the user wants to upload new content for the document, false otherwise.

      • setUploadFile

        public void setUploadFile(boolean uploadFile)
        Indicate whether the user wants to upload new content for the document. If uploadFile is false, the WebFile field will be set to null.
        Parameters:
        uploadFile - True if the user wants to upload new content for the document, false otherwise.
